Description of incident: SterlingBackcheck notified customers of a data breach when a laptop was stolen from an employees vehicle. The laptop contained customer information including names, Social Security numbers, and dates of birth.The company is providing AllClear ID for 24 months for free. For those who are affected call 1-855-227-9823 Monday through Sunday  8:00 am - 8:00 pm Central Time. More Information: http://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-57330
